data.title: Inside Apple’s AI Shake-Up and Its Plans for Two New Versions of Siri - Bloomberg.com
data.snippet:
Apple:

Siri Revamp

Creative Apps Bundle

App Store Fight

iPhone 17 Line

New Watches

AirPods Pro 3

Newsletter

Power On

# Inside Apple’s AI Shake-Up and Its Plans for Two New Versions of Siri

Contact us:

Provide news feedback or report an error

Confidential tip?

Send a tip to our reporters

Site feedback:

Take our Survey

By Mark Gurman

This article is for subscribers only.

Apple shakes up its AI efforts with a Google partnership, management changes and two new versions of Siri. Also: The company gets ready to kick off its 2026 Mac launches and puts CEO candidate John Ternus in charge of design.

Last time in Power On: Apple’s iOS 27 will be a Snow Leopard-style update — aside from new AI features.

Before it's here, it's on the Bloomberg Terminal

# The evolution of digital twins from reactive to agentic systems

 Omer San 
  ORCID: orcid.org/0000-0002-2241-46481,
 Adil Rasheed2,
 Eda Bozdemir3 &
 …
 Jun Deng4,5

Nature Computational Science
volume 6, pages 6–10 (2026)Cite this article

Digital twins are evolving into self-learning, autonomous systems that link models, data and human interaction. Realizing their full potential depends on interoperability, standardization and the integration of artificial intelligence and advanced computational reasoning across sectors.
